Utilize natural light by opening up the curtains and blinds during the day to allow sunlight to enter the room.
Install a skylight to bring in natural light and brighten up the room.
Use glow-in-the-dark paint or stickers to add a fun and playful touch to the room.
Place reflective objects around the room to bounce off light and create a brighter atmosphere.
Install a solar-powered light system that uses energy from the sun to power the lights.
